content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Ms. Wang. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg, let me first propose a slightly higher rental figure than what you may have anticipated. This is to ensure maximum return on my investment. Now, please consider my suggested price of 1150 Euros per month. If you find this acceptable, I agree to the price of [1150] Euro! However, if this doesn't suit you, do let me know why so I can decide whether to continue negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I think the price is too high. I am a student and I am looking for a place with a more affordable price. Would you consider lowering the price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your situation as a student, but remember, I'm under no obligation to compromise on the rental price due to individual circumstances. That said, considering your need for affordability, I'm willing to lower the price by just 100 Euros, making it 1050 Euros per month. If this revised price is still not suitable for you, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because affordability limits have been reached. Please consider my final offer and respond accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still think the price is too high for me as a student. Would you consider lowering the price again?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I have already adjusted the price significantly to accommodate your financial constraints as a student. Lowering it further would not be feasible for me, given my investment goals. Since we have reached an impasse, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my minimum acceptable rental amount has not been met. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
